attributes.action: stop your blatent attack on smokers the more you ban the more people will want to do it
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I urge the goverment to stop there witch hunt on smokers . I for one am sick of your goverment ministers that are trying to tell me what i can and cannot do , it is a life choice that as a grown adult i get to make stop your nanny state witch hunts from ministers i have never heard of , and do something for the people for a change that is of some use just remember that when election time comes you can all be replaced by the next suit i for one have lost all faith in politics in the united kingdom and reading the paper is very traumatic why not just ban every thing and have done with it , england is getting like a communist goverment that doesnt listen to the people and seems to do as it pleases

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
